mapper.insert: insert into todolist(tlno, content, state, tldate, tdno, id, tlstart) values (todolist_seq.nextval, #{content}, 1, #{tldate} ,#{tdno}, #{id}, #{tlstart})
mapper.update: update todolist set content=#{content},tdno=#{tdno}, id=#{id}, tldate=#{tldate}, tlstart=#{tlstart} where tlno=#{tlno}
mapper.select: select distinct tl.tlno, t.content as title, tl.content, to_char(tl.tldate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')tldate, tl.id, tl.state, to_char(tl.tlstart, 'yyyy/mm/dd')tlstart from todo t, todolist tl where t.tdno= tl.tdno and t.pno=#{pno} order by title asc
select tl.tlno, tl.content, tl.state, to_char(tl.tldate,'yyyy-mm-dd')tldate, tl.tdno, tl.id, to_char(tl.tlstart, 'yyyy-mm-dd')tlstart from todolist tl, todo t where tl.tdno=t.tdno and tlno=#{tlno}
mapper.update: update todolist set state=2 where tlno=#{tlno}
